meanings.definition: The act of shaping metal by heating and hammering
meanings.sent1: The smithings of the metalworker were loud and rhythmic.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith's shop was filled with various smithings in progress.
meanings.sent3: The apprentice tried his hand at smithings, but ended up with a twisted mess.
meanings.sent4: The smithings of the hammer on the anvil echoed through the workshop.
meanings.sent5: The intricate smithings of the sword blade were admired by all.
meanings.sent6: With each strike, the smithings of the metal grew stronger.
meanings.sent7: The village celebrated the completion of the smithings with a feast.

meanings.definition: The products created by a blacksmith
meanings.sent1: The beautiful smithings displayed in the shop caught the eye of many.
meanings.sent2: Customers admired the quality of the smithings crafted by the blacksmith.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to sneak off with a small piece of smithings.
meanings.sent4: The smithings gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing the blacksmith's skill.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the smithings made them highly sought after.
meanings.sent6: The smithings were carefully packaged and sent off to customers.
meanings.sent7: The blacksmith took pride in each of his unique smithings.

meanings.definition: The skill or trade of a blacksmith
meanings.sent1: Learning the art of smithings requires dedication and practice.
meanings.sent2: The master blacksmith passed down his knowledge of smithings to the apprentice.
meanings.sent3: The village recognized the importance of the smithings in their community.
meanings.sent4: The smithings of the blacksmith were known far and wide for their quality.
meanings.sent5: The apprentice honed his smithings under the guidance of the master.
meanings.sent6: The art of smithings has been passed down through generations.
meanings.sent7: The blacksmith's skill in smithings was unmatched in the region.
